{"title": "Graveyard Shift (2010)", "title_search": "graveyard shift 2010", "title_keyword": "graveyard shift 2010", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/graveyard-shift-2010/", "summary": "Graveyard Shift is a physics puzzler with funny bones and ragdoll skeleton twist.   All skeletons have jumped out of their coffins at the ring of midnight and as the cemetery keeper, you are tasked to get them back in there. Get the skeletons back into their coffins before the break of dawn using the wacky environments in this hilarious and addictive game. You remove various types of blocks by tapping them, triggering chain reactions and hopefully precipitating the skeleton into his casket.  The game features:  * 72 Levels. * Per level "best time" and "minimum taps". * Intro - Outro comic pages. * A hilarious ragdoll that will get you laughing as he tumbles down * Retina Ready  ------------------------------ An issue has been found where occasionally a level appears to be empty. The work around for this is to load another level and then go back and reload the empty one again. {"title": "Car Troller", "title_search": "car troller", "title_keyword": "car troller", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/car-troller/", "summary": "Wroom, wroom.... Beep! Beep! Car Troller is a superb traffic control game for iPhone and iPod Touch that every gamer would want. How many times did you curse traffic jams or broken traffic lights? Take the power in your hands!   Extremely simple, this game puts you in charge of managing the roads of the whole TOWN with just one finger. Your hands have to be steady enough to CONTROL different intersections and practically infinite swift CAR stream. Tap on the TRAFFIC LIGHTS to change their color from green to RED and back. Respect to all participants of the road traffic is crucial: do not hold vehicles up too long for AVOIDING jams, but don't let them run fast for preventing ACCIDENTS.   As in REAL life, all these cars, trucks, buses, ambulances, police CARS and motorcycles have different SPEED. 20 levels of ever increasing difficulty offer lots of COMPLEX intersections and require you to be very WATCHFUL.   The level selection menu allows continuing playing where you left off or loading already completed levels. The game can be paused at any moment, any level can be replayed. Made in beautiful Pixel Art, amazingly SIMPLE and the same time breathtaking, Car Troller is a perfect game for those who like games that develop attention, good REACTION and strategic thinking.   Game features include: "fast pick-up and play" gameplay Level selection menu Global scoring system Hyped music and sound effects  Summer and winter levels Pleasant old school Pixel Art", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-12-29", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140161-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140161-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Avallon Alliance Ltd. {"title": "NBA Hotshot", "title_search": "nba hotshot", "title_keyword": "nba hotshot", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/nba-hotshot/", "summary": "Take your best shot with Freeverse's latest arcade release NBA Hotshot!  This classic arcade game is now officially licensed by the NBA and ready to play whenever and wherever you are! Sink baskets to rack up points and earn awards, achievements and more!   Two modes of gameplay make time-racing fans and high score elitists equally happy. Plus+ integration will have you bragging to your friends and family about your awesome skills and bluetooth support means gamers can battle it out head to head, with up to five players in any game mode!  Have a favorite NBA team? Then dominate the game in their name! Collect their official NBA team basketball to use or display. The amazing physics coupled with the fun, flashy graphics will get your heart pumping and your finger flicking. Add this to your Flick Sports collection today!  Features include: - Classic Play: race against the clock to climb the high score list - Three Strikes: precision is the key as you attempt to climb the leaderboards. Choose your shots carefully because it's three-strikes and you're OUT! - NBA Prize Gallery: high scores will help to earn you awesome prizes like actual team balls you can use in-game - Plus+ integration allows for a quick and simple way to check leaderboards and achievements as well as compare scores with friends from around the world! - Seamlessly integrated multiplayer support allows up to five players to battle it out head-to-head in any game mode  NBA Hotshot... Play BIG or go home!", "genre": ["Basketball"], "metascore": "68", "critic_reviews": 6, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-01-05", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140472-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140472-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Freeverse (Publisher)", "Freeverse (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Super Football Kick 3D", "title_search": "super football kick 3d", "title_keyword": "super football kick 3d", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/super-football-kick-3d/", "summary": "Have you ever watched a football game and wondered how a kicker could miss such an easy field goal attempt?  Now is your chance to show them how it's done!   Test your skills in 6 rounds from varying distances, each with 10 kick attempts.  Earn points based on the accuracy of your kick and compare your scores with friends and others on the online global leaderboard.  This game is simple but satisfying for football fans that need a quick game to play.  Game Includes: - Highly polished gorgeous 3D graphics - Innovative flick control - Global online scoreboard - Real football sounds - Crowd reacts to your performance - View your kicks from different camera angles - OpenFeint 2.4  ----------------------------------------------  About the Rocking Pocket Engine: The Rocking Pocket Engine is based on a PC game engine that was developed for 15 years before being ported to the iPhone OS.  Features include: - Support for OpenGL version 1.1 and 2.0 - Currently the only engine on iPhone to support realtime per pixel shadow mapping optimized for 3GS processors  - Advanced shaders and per pixel lighting - Keyframe Animation systems", "genre": ["Football Sim"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-01-06", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140713-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-140713-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Egerter Software (Publisher)", "Egerter Software (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Fruit Swap", "title_search": "fruit swap", "title_keyword": "fruit swap", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/fruit-swap/", "summary": "A fun and addictive match-3 puzzle game. In the game there are a grid of fruits, you have to destroy the fruits by swapping them. The fruits will be destroyed if a line of 3 or more fruits of the same kind are there. When some fruits are destroyed, new fruits will be created. {"title": "Eternal Eden: Ecclesia", "title_search": "eternal eden ecclesia", "title_keyword": "eternal eden ecclesia", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/eternal-eden-ecclesia/", "summary": "After eons of dwelling in nothingness, the world of Ecclesia re-emerges inexplicably into existence. The survivors are lost and devastated... they have no clear memories of the incident that triggered their sudden blackout from reality... they aren't prepared for what awaits them. Even worse, the fabric of this reality is unstable and volatile, and their homecoming is incomplete.  Meanwhile, a foreign opponent reveals himself as an immaculate angel from Heaven, Gethsemane the Righteous One, whose sole purpose is to cast the people of Ecclesia back into the realm of nonexistence, punishment for the mistakes they cannot remember.  Despite the hopelessness of their situation, the survivors discover a ray of light: a demon from the past. This fearsome creature their ancestors long ago christened 'The Despair,' a name they spoke with dread and fright... is now the only hope left for Ecclesia.  Eternal Eden: Ecclesia is a direct sequel to the 2008 role playing video game, Eternal Eden.   In the first installment the player traveled in two parallel worlds. In this upcoming installment, the journey has evolved a bit differently; the player explores a single world but it's constantly influenced by four powerful reality paradigms (Cryo, Terra, Inferno and Omega). This revolutionary concept will amp up the gameplay experience in a totally new and addictive way.", "genre": ["JRPG"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": null, "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-185289-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-185289-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Blossomsoft (Developer)", "Blossomsoft (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["PC", "iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "My Virtual Girlfriend", "title_search": "my virtual girlfriend", "title_keyword": "my virtual girlfriend", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/my-virtual-girlfriend/", "summary": "My Virtual Girlfriend is a fully 3D, girl dating simulation game with lots of humor and mature themes.   You start out by filling out a dating profile similar to those found on the popular dating websites, including a little info about you, as well as what aspects you like to see in a partner.  Once the information is gathered it narrows it down to the top three choices based on your preferences and offers you to select one lucky girl to have a virtual relationship with.    After your initial meeting, you can interact with your girl in several different ways.  Respond to her dialog through emotes, select from various actions or activities and you can even touch her and she will respond differently depending on her mood and level of intimacy you have reached.    Every Action in the game has a consequence.  You can get closer by doing the right things, but if you do the wrong things- your relationship will dissolve and she will leave you! Treat her right and keep her forever.  Here are just some of the unique features of the game:  - The ONLY virtual Girlfriend Simulator available on Iphone and Itouch. - Unique dating profile system matches you up to the best possible choices. - Girls have unique personalities. - Girl Generator creates a unique girl every time- allowing for combinations of literally thousands of unique and beautiful 3d women. - Over 1500 Unique lines of clever and humorous dialog keep it entertaining. - There are several ways to interact:  Emotes, Actions, Activities and Touch! - Full 3d environment allows for easy navigation around the scene. - Girls have unique yet distinct personalities with dialog to match. - Mature themes and humor intended for the adult male.", "genre": ["Virtual Life"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-05-12", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154059-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154059-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": [], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
